extendedInfo.description: âââââ Picasso - Scratch Draw! âââââIntroducing another app from the makers of popular Picasso - Draw, Paint, Doodle! drawing app : Picasso â Scratch Draw!Indulge your inner child with Picasso â Scratch Draw!Drawing is now in reverse.   Picasso â Scratch Draw! opens up a whole new world of drawing fun.  You have to scratch away the black screen to draw your picture.  Itâs very simple and fun way to let your creativity flow.  Regardless of drawing skills, you can create magical scratch art using only a few scratches.  Your simple doodle with only a few strokes can turn into a stunning masterpiece!  The result will surprise you.***Push menu to get Load, Save, Share Options***âChoose from many custom backgrounds.  One is randomly selected every time you start the app!âExclusive new Stamp mode!  Try 6 different stamps in many different sizes!  Prepare yourself for unstoppable fun!âLoad from your Gallery to use your own picture as a background.  Scratch and reveal the photo!âLoad other Picasso App pictures to use as a background.  We suggest creating your very own custom background using Picasso â Kaleidoscope Draw!   You can create amazing background easily.âSuper Duper Undo :  You can undo your entire drawing if you wanted to.âShare your picture via social network or email. (Appropriate Social Network app needed)âCheck your drawing by browsing over the Gallery -> PicassoâââââThank you for using Picasso â Scratch Draw! âââââE-mails us your suggestions, and send us your awesome creations!Keywords:  Paint, Draw, Doodle, Drawing Pad, Sketch, Fun, Glow, Easy, Masterpiece, Painting, Photo, Picture, Touch, Finger paint, Coloring, Color, Paint Brush, Painter, Free Sketch, Photo, Fun, Photography, Sketch Pad, Scratch Paint, Scratch, Scratch Draw, Stamp Draw, Scratch Art
